job.title: Senior Data Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtAbout GameChangerltstronggtltpgtltpgtWe believe sports are important because they encourage leadership teamwork responsibility and confidencecritical life lessons that have the power to propel our youthampnbsptoward meaningful futures We recognize that without coaches parents and volunteers organized youth sports could not exist We celebrate those dedicated heroes and make it our mission to help them do what they do bestltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtGameChanger provides teams across the country with team management and scorekeeping capabilities as well as live fan experiences that keep parents family and friends engagedampnbspas games are announced animated and video streamed in realtime With GameChanger coaches and parents are able to organize and follow their athletes journey in a simple and powerful wayltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtBased in downtown Manhattan GameChanger is a cuttingedge technology company and a proud member of the DICKS Sporting Goods familyltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtThe PositionltstronggtltpgtltpgtAs a Senior Data Engineer you will work together in a crossdisciplinary team of Data Scientists Production Engineers and Data Engineers to evolve our data pipeline warehouse and workflow systems to be more resilient extensible and maintainableampnbspYou will also design and extend data models for a normalized data warehouse with terabytes of data to be turned into sports and customer insights Our solutions benefit everyone including Product Managers Developers Data Scientists Marketing Executives Coaches Players and ParentsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhat Youll DoltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtPartner with the analytics team to provide the data and tools they need to solve complex problemsltligtltligtCollaborate across the engineering organization to develop relational database designs and queriesltligtltligtWork with product teams to get feature data emitted into the data pipeline and engage with them to leverage insights to inform their roadmapltligtltligtIdentify improvements in the flow of our dataltligtltligtEvaluate new technologies both selfmanaged and services for moving transforming modeling and storing data and make recommendationsltligtltligtImprove ETL efficiencyltligtltligtWork with Engineers in other parts of DICKS Sporting Goods to design data flows across businessesltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWho You Areltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt3 years of software development experience preferably as a data or backend engineerltligtltligtExperienced with Scala Python or TypescriptampnbspltligtltligtFamiliar with Apache Kafka or other streaming technologiesampnbspltligtltligtComfortable working across multiple languages databases paradigms etcltligtltligtEager to learn about a range of technologies Our teams use a variety of languages databases and technologies to accomplish their objectives so were always learning and sharingltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtPerksltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtWork remotely or from our wellfurnished modern office in NYCs FiDiltligtltligtUnlimited vacation policyltligtltligtTechnology stipend  3500 every 2 years to purchase new technologyltligtltligtFull health benefits  medical dental vision prescription FSAHRA etc as well as coverage for familydependentsltligtltligtLife insurance  basic life supplemental life and dependent lifeltligtltligtDisability leave  shortterm disability and longterm disabilityltligtltligtRetirement savings  401K plan offered through VanguardltligtltligtGenerous maternitypaternity leaveltligtltligtCommuter benefitsltligtltligtDICKS Sporting Goods Teammate DiscountltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWe are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company We do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability statusltpgt
